taskDescription:
The total number of ebooks sold in 2013 was 242 million (<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <msub>
      <mi>a</mi>
      <mn>1</mn>
    </msub>
  </mrow>
  <mo>=</mo>
  <mn>242</mn>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">{a_1} = 242</annotation></semantics></math>). Each year, the number of ebooks sold has declined by 3% (<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>r</mi>
  <mo>=</mo>
  <mn>0.97</mn>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">r = 0.97</annotation></semantics></math>). How many ebooks were sold between 2013 and 2022?
